user_id = #{userId},
subject_id = #{subjectId},
user_answer = #{userAnswer},
is_correct = #{isCorrect},
answer_time = #{answerTime},
time_cost = #{timeCost},
score = #{score},
create_time = #{createTime},

where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM subject_record WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY answer_time DESC

SELECT
FROM subject_record WHERE subject_id = #{subjectId} ORDER BY answer_time DESC
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT subject_id) FROM subject_record WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_correct = 1

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(answer_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as date, COUNT(*) as count FROM subject_record WHERE answer_time >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL #{days} DAY) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(answer_time, '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY date ASC
